title: Brass Cats
venue: @Mesa Arts Center - 1 E Main St, Mesa, AZ 85201: @Mesa, AZ
description: The Salt River Brass presents an unforgettable evening of jazz standards! Vocalist Nathan DeShon Myers returns as you immerse yourself in the timeless sounds of various jazz genres and let the music move you. Secure your tickets now and experience the magic of live jazz!

title: Inspiration
venue: @Mesa Arts Center - 1 E Main St, Mesa, AZ 85201: @Mesa, AZ
description: Join the Salt River Brass for a Celebration of Youth and Inspiration. Experience the joy of music and the power of growth at this special concert event. Arizona’s Premier Brass Band is exciting to offer you a concert full of collaborations.Opening the event, the Salt River Youth Brass Band is showcasing their talent and remarkable progress through an inspiring selection of pieces. Following this, the Salt River Brass will take the stage with a vibrant and energetic program guaranteed to captivate audiences.In the second half, we are thrilled to welcome once again our colleague Master Sergeant (MSG) Kevin Geboin an unforgettable set of spectacular pieces. Lastly, a united stage with all musicians performing “Stars and Stripes Forever” will deliver an emotional and celebratory finale, showcasing the talent and spirit of all ensembles, and is guaranteed to leave a lasting impression.
